short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to remind you to stand up every hour.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay Active and Healthy While Working!

Stand-Up Reminder is your personal health assistant for productive work sessions. Sitting for long hours at your desk can be harmful to your posture, focus, and overall well-being. This simple yet effective extension reminds you to stand up, stretch, or walk for 5 minutes every hour.
Key Features:

    Hourly Notifications: Receive friendly reminders to take a 5-minute break.
    Improved Health: Reduces fatigue, improves circulation, and helps avoid prolonged sitting.
    Focus and Productivity: Short breaks help refresh your mind and increase efficiency.
    Lightweight and Non-Intrusive: Runs quietly in the background without affecting your workflow.

Why Use Stand-Up Reminder?
Taking regular breaks is proven to:

    Reduce the risk of back pain and repetitive stress injuries.
    Improve mood and mental clarity.
    Boost energy levels for better performance.

Install Stand-Up Reminder and make standing up a healthy habit!
